snippet.title: Spyrazoid Spinner - Rounds 1-5 Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Introducing Spyrazoid, a minimalist puzzle game available on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyrazoid/id1585455563

In Spyrazoid Spinner, you spin hexagons until every point is positioned with a circle of matching color!  Seems easy at the start, but just wait until you run into the final circles where matching one point throws off all the surrounding points. And with 180 pre-programmed boards and infinite randomly-generated boards, the fun never ends.  How many rounds can you complete?

00:00 - Round 1
00:45 - Round 2
01:38 - Round 3
03:24 - Round 4
06:37 - Round 5

Directions: https://spyraverse.com/spyrazoid/?mode=spinner

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyrazoid #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
